review: It does what it advertise and I had no problems with set-up or using the device
author: Blain F.

review: Nice gadget for the prize. I could already do a lot of what this does through my BluRay. But the ability to play stuff directly from my iphone is good. I'm waiting to see if they develop more apps.
author: Efrias

review: Came quickly, just what I expected.  Had this for better than a week, seems to work perfectly.
author: Douglas D. Tripp

review: Excelent, it does what it promeses
author: Gachupas

review: Great little HD streaming device.  Easy setup and great picture quality'
author: Amazon Customer

review: I'm not sure what to say.  I spent more time troubleshooting this thing the first two days than I did enjoying HBOGO or YouTube on it.Also... I am not able to plug it into my TV, as it "overpowers" the USB connection and the TV barks at me to unplug it.  It works fine with the (included) power cable though, so that's what I've done for now.RUNS REALLY HOT.I'll see how I like it in a month, when I'm moved into my new place.
author: R. Batista "Ruissimo"

review: LOVE this Chromecast device - we use it daily (nightly) !  Works extremely well, without hiccups.  Highly recommend it for broadcasting Netflix (from the computer to the TV)!
author: Andrew F.
